materials.raw_text:
Chromium(III) oxide (Cr2O3) - 66.5 g  
 Potassium nitrate (KNO3) - 21.5 g  
 Samarium oxide (Sm2O3) - 12.0 g

sourcing.instructions:
Chromium(III) oxide can be sourced from chemical supply companies or online chemical retailers. 
 Potassium nitrate is commonly available at garden supply stores or online. 
 Samarium oxide can be purchased from specialized chemical suppliers or scientific supply companies.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 66.5 g of Chromium(III) oxide (Cr2O3) and place it in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 2. Add 21.5 g of Potassium nitrate (KNO3) to the container. 
 3. Finally, add 12.0 g of Samarium oxide (Sm2O3). 
 4. Use a clean spatula to mix the powders thoroughly until they achieve a uniform consistency. Ensure no clumps remain.
